[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1519194336990{background-image: url(https://sortwallet.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/slide.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”150″ md_spacing=”100″ sm_spacing=”70″ xs_spacing=”40″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”top” text=”DAPPS Support Token” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

We Open protocol for connecting Wallets to Dapps

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Validate Now!” style=”gradient” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsortwallet.net%2Fform%2F|title:form”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”200″ md_spacing=”150″ sm_spacing=”100″ xs_spacing=”60″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1519629721543{padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://sortwallet.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/stmx_bg.jpg) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” el_class=”bg-valign” el_id=”about”][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”115″ md_spacing=”100″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”50″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Core” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23808080″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”What are Crypto Tokens?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”65″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]

The term crypto token refers to a special virtual currency token or how cryptocurrencies are denominated. These tokens represent fungible and tradable assets or utilities that reside on their own blockchains. Crypto tokens are often used to fundraise for crowd sales, but they can also be used as a substitute for other things. These tokens are usually created, distributed, sold, and circulated through the standard initial coin offering (ICO) process, which involves a crowdfunding exercise to fund project development.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”40″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1630603476152{background-image: url(https://sortwallet.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/BlogpostThumb.png?id=3887) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”400″ md_spacing=”400″ sm_spacing=”300″ xs_spacing=”300″][vc_video align=”center” style=”style_2″ title=”WATCH VIDEO” subtitle=”About STMX” css=”.vc_custom_1519217464508{margin-left: 30px !important;}”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”140″ md_spacing=”100″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”50″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”73″ parallax_speed_bg=”2″][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1519277403572{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1519277398685{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-ico_campaign” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1519276897401{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Wallet

Validation” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:24px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1519278267006{padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”]

Token Development and ICO Marketing.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1519277912381{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-marketplace” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1519277846785{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Best Token
Practices” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:24px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Legal governance, risk management, and compliance.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1519277916557{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-btc_auditable” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1519277949688{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Unique Size of
Market” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:24px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Starting in May 2018, STMX can be utilized for many purposes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-marketplace” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1519277846785{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Operational platform” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:24px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1519278210894{margin-bottom: 34px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Decentralized Platform for Tokens and Smart Contracts.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”140″ md_spacing=”100″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”50″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”How do we validate your Tokens?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1630688362990{margin-top: 230px !important;}”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”115″ md_spacing=”115″ sm_spacing=”100″ xs_spacing=”100″][vc_single_image image=”3903″ img_size=”400×405″ alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1630681434247{margin-top: -160px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”115″ md_spacing=”115″ sm_spacing=”100″ xs_spacing=”100″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]This approach guarantees that the token is valid, not expired or revoked. Every backend service validates access token only by signature. Some services that have strong security requirements (e.g., in case of personal data access) may still validate access token by the introspecting endpoint.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Validate Now!” style=”gradient” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsortwallet.net%2Fform%2F|title:form”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column wave_pulse=”enable” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1519281179635{margin-top: 230px !important;}”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”115″ md_spacing=”115″ sm_spacing=”100″ xs_spacing=”100″][vc_single_image image=”3902″ img_size=”400×405″ alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1630681121703{margin-top: -160px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]The ValidateToken method is called by the infrastructure to validate and extract the claims from the deserialized security token. These claims are returned in the collection of ClaimsIdentity objects returned by the method. In the typical case, this collection will contain a single identity.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Validate Now!” style=”gradient” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsortwallet.net%2Fform%2F|title:form”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1630688327574{margin-top: 230px !important;}”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”115″ md_spacing=”115″ sm_spacing=”100″ xs_spacing=”100″][vc_single_image image=”3906″ img_size=”400×405″ alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1630683115726{margin-top: -160px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]By specifying a key here, the token can be validated without any need for the issuing server. What is needed, instead, is the location of the public key. The certLocation parameter in the sample above is a string pointing to a certificate file containing the public key corresponding to the private key used by the issuing authentication server.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Validate Now!” style=”gradient” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsortwallet.net%2Fform%2F|title:form”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1519629778887{background-image: url(https://sortwallet.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/yellow.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”benefits”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Structure” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23808080″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”What is WalletConnect?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”title_dark_stripe”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”40″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]

WalletConnect is an open source protocol for connecting decentralised applications to mobile wallets with QR code scanning or deep linking. A user can interact securely with any Dapp from their mobile phone, making WalletConnect wallets a safer choice compared to desktop or browser extension wallets.

[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”100″ md_spacing=”80″ sm_spacing=”60″ xs_spacing=”50″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1519629800090{padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #e5e6ea !important;}” el_id=”roadmap”][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-10 vc_col-md-10″][vc_custom_heading text=”” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23808080″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”How does it work?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]

WalletConnect connects web applications to supported mobile wallets. WalletConnect session is started by a scanning a QR code (desktop) or by clicking an application deep link (mobile).
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Validate Now!” style=”gradient” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsortwallet.net%2Fform%2F|title:form”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1519362167127{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”100″ md_spacing=”80″ sm_spacing=”70″ xs_spacing=”50″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”Wallets” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Multiple iOS and Android wallets support the WalletConnect protocol. Interaction between mobile apps and mobile browsers are supported via mobile deep linking.
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Metamask” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”
